content.question: Which of the following actions will provide a negative control for the investigation?

choices.label: Repeating the experiment at <math alttext="25 degrees Celsius" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>25</mtext><mo>Â°</mo><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>
Repeating the experiment using twice the amount of hydrogen peroxide
Repeating the experiment using twice the amount of peroxidase
Repeating the experiment using heat-denatured peroxidase

content.answer: Repeating the experiment using heat-denatured peroxidase

skill.text: 3.C: Identify experimental procedures that align with the question, including: i. identifying dependent and independent variables ii. identifying appropriate controls iii. justifying appropriate controls
